subject: Wholesale Inquiry
description_text:
Howdy,

I have daily inquiries about your equipment, so I'd like to set up a new
account with you guys for my retail store. Looking forward to getting
connected with you guys! Let me know how you would like to proceed.

Please reply at your earliest convenience, I think we are missing out on a
decent amount of volume here.

Thanks

Mike

conversations.body_text: Hi RacingServices,  May I ask whether you plan to sell offline or online?

The plan is both. We do in-person sales and on-site sim events constantly.
For example we are responsible for all sim events that The ACO hosts in the
united states. The ACO is the group responsible for the 24 Hours of Le Mans
in real life. So we will be selling your products at events such as those,
as well as on our website.

Thanks

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 1:11 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi RacingServices,  Do you already have a product list, purchasing plan, and estimated quantities? If so, I can arrange for our sales team to contact you directly to discuss the details.

Yes

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026, 9:49 PM service@simsonn.com

When will I be in contact with someone?


On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 9:49 PM service@simsonn.com
